title: Raging
description:
Smith Galtney, Milana Vayntrub and Ray Christian share stories of times that emotion or impulse got the best of them.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Ratatat, Milana Vayntrub, Kendra Morris, Ray Christian, Jeff Barr, Smith Galtney, Nina Simone, Kevin Allison)
